Address.label: Address
Address.value: 6400 SOUTH FIDDLERS GREEN CIRCLE,SUITE 525, GREENWOOD VILLAGE, Colorado, 80111, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Sobr Safe Inc is engaged in developing alcohol-detecting devices to address the automotive alcohol sensing spectrum. The company has developed an alcohol detection device called SOBR. This device is patented and is used for detecting alcohol in a human system by testing the ethanol content in the perspiration.
